description: [Cleaver](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0003) has obtained and used open-source tools such as [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029), [Windows Credential Editor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0005), and [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002).(Citation: Cylance Cleaver)

external_references.description: Cylance. (2014, December). Operation Cleaver. Retrieved September 14, 2017.
